import React from'react';import{VuiFlexContainer,VuiFlexItem,VuiTitle,VuiText}from'../../ui';import'./harvardManagementDocuments.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DOCUMENTS=[// Student Services & Support

const groupDocumentsByType=docs=>{const groups={};docs.forEach(doc=>{if(!groups[doc.type]){groups[doc.type]=[];}groups[doc.type].push(doc);});return groups;};export const HarvardManagementDocuments=()=>{const groupedDocuments=groupDocumentsByType(DOCUMENTS);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"documentsContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"documentsContent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VuiFlexContainer,{direction:"column",spacing:"l",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VuiFlexItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VuiTitle,{size:"l",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"References"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VuiFlexItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VuiFlexContainer,{wrap:true,children:Object.entries(groupedDocuments).map(_ref=>{let[type,docs]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VuiFlexItem,{grow:1,className:"categoryWrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"categorySection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VuiTitle,{size:"m",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:type})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"categoryDocuments",children:docs.map(doc=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"documentItem",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VuiText,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"documentTitle",children:doc.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"documentDate",children:doc.date})]})},doc.id))})]})},type);})})})]})})});};
